languages.text: "Приказ 424, пункт 79, поправка 8 закона "О заверении Меркатум Табула Официале с попечительства держателя Торгового Патента": "Вольному Торговцу должно присутствовать при заверении каждой печати, в противном случае документ велено считать недействительным".

traits.locale_text: "Приказ 424, пункт 79, поправка 8 закона "О заверении Меркатум Табула Официале с попечительства держателя Торгового Птента": "Вольному Торговцу должно присутствовать при заверении каждой печати, в противном случае документ велено считать недействительным".
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Decree 424, Clause 79, Amendment 8 of the Law on Certifying a Mercatum Tabula Officiale With Sponsorship of a Bearer of the Warrant of Trade: 'The sponsoring Rogue Trader must be present at the placing and certifying of each seal. If this requirement is not met, the document will be deemed invalid.'"
languages.original_text: "Приказ 424, пункт 79, поправка 8 закона "О заверении Меркатум Табула Официале с попечительства держателя Торгового Патента": "Вольному Торговцу должно присутствовать при заверении каждой печати, в противном случае документ велено считать недействительным".

traits.locale_text: "Decree 424, Clause 79, Amendment 8 of the Law on Certifying a Mercatum Tabula Officiale With Sponsorship of a Bearer of the Warrant of Trade: 'The sponsoring Rogue Trader must be present at the placing and certifying of each seal. If this requirement is not met, the document will be deemed invalid.'"
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "Decree 424, Clause 79, Amendment 8 of the Law on Certifying a Mercatum Tabula Officiale With Sponsorship of a Bearer of the Warrant of Trade: 'The sponsoring Rogue Trader must be present at the placing and certifying of each seal. If this requirement is not met, the document will be deemed invalid.'"

traits.locale_text: "Decree 424, Clause 79, Amendment 8 of the Law on Certifying a Mercatum Tabula Officiale With Sponsorship of a Bearer of the Warrant of Trade: 'The sponsoring Rogue Trader must be present at the placing and certifying of each seal. If this requirement is not met, the document will be deemed invalid.'"

traits.locale_text: "Decree 424, Clause 79, Amendment 8 of the Law on Certifying a Mercatum Tabula Officiale With Sponsorship of a Bearer of the Warrant of Trade: 'The sponsoring Rogue Trader must be present at the placing and certifying of each seal. If this requirement is not met, the document will be deemed invalid.'"
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: “根据《贸易授状的持有者赞助帝国官方行商执照的认证相关规定》第424号法令，第79条，第8号修正案，‘赞助行商执照的行商浪人必须在盖章的时候在场，如果不符合这一要求，盖章文件将视为没有法律效力。’”
languages.original_text: "Decree 424, Clause 79, Amendment 8 of the Law on Certifying a Mercatum Tabula Officiale With Sponsorship of a Bearer of the Warrant of Trade: 'The sponsoring Rogue Trader must be present at the placing and certifying of each seal. If this requirement is not met, the document will be deemed invalid.'"

traits.locale_text: “根据《贸易许可证的持有者赞助帝国官方行商执照的认证相关规定》第424号法令，第79条，第8号修正案，‘赞助行商执照的行商浪人必须在盖章的时候在场，如果不符合这一要求，盖章文件将视为没有法律效力。’”
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: «Según el decreto 424, cláusula 79, 8.ª enmienda de la ley de certificación de Mercatum Tabula Officiale con portador de Patente de Comercio como garante: "El Comerciante Independiente garante deberá estar presente durante la aplicación y la certificación de cada sello. En caso de no reunir este requisito, el documento carecerá de validez"».
languages.original_text: "Decree 424, Clause 79, Amendment 8 of the Law on Certifying a Mercatum Tabula Officiale With Sponsorship of a Bearer of the Warrant of Trade: 'The sponsoring Rogue Trader must be present at the placing and certifying of each seal. If this requirement is not met, the document will be deemed invalid.'"

traits.locale_text: «Según el decreto 424, cláusula 79, 8.ª enmienda de la ley de certificación de Mercatum Tabula Officiale con portador de Patente de Comercio como garante: "El Comerciante Independiente garante deberá estar presente durante la aplicación y la certificación de cada sello. En caso de no reunir este requisito, el documento carecerá de validez"».
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: 「通商許可証を有する運搬人の支援を受けるメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルに関する法律424例79条修正条項8に基づく手順です。『自由開拓者がその支援者となる場合、自由開拓者の同席の上で押印と認証を受けなくてはならない。本要件が満たされない場合、当該文書は無効となる』とあります」
languages.original_text: "Decree 424, Clause 79, Amendment 8 of the Law on Certifying a Mercatum Tabula Officiale With Sponsorship of a Bearer of the Warrant of Trade: 'The sponsoring Rogue Trader must be present at the placing and certifying of each seal. If this requirement is not met, the document will be deemed invalid.'"

traits.locale_text: 「通商許可証を有する運搬人の支援を受けるメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルに関する法律424例79条修正条項8に基づく手順です。『自由開拓者がその支援者となる場合、自由開拓者の同席の上で押印と認証を受けなくてはならない。本要件が満たされない場合、当該文書は無効となる』とあります」
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: « Décret 424, alinéa 79 du 8e amendement à la loi sur l'accréditation d'une Mercatum Tabula Officiale cautionnée par un détenteur de la lettre de marque : "Le libre-marchand qui se porte garant doit impérativement être présent lors de l'apposition et de l'authentification de chaque sceau, faute de quoi le document sera jugé non conforme." »
languages.original_text: "Decree 424, Clause 79, Amendment 8 of the Law on Certifying a Mercatum Tabula Officiale With Sponsorship of a Bearer of the Warrant of Trade: 'The sponsoring Rogue Trader must be present at the placing and certifying of each seal. If this requirement is not met, the document will be deemed invalid.'"

traits.locale_text: « Décret 424, alinéa 79 du 8e amendement à la loi sur l'accréditation d'une Mercatum Tabula Officiale cautionnée par un détenteur de la lettre de marque : "Le libre-marchand qui se porte garant doit impérativement être présent lors de l'apposition et de l'authentification de chaque sceau, faute de quoi le document sera jugé non conforme." »
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Erlass 424, Absatz 79, Zusatz 8 des Gesetzes zur Zertifizierung eines Mercatum Tabula Officiale bei Unterstützung durch einen Träger des Handelsbriefs: 'Der unterstützende Freihändler muss bei Vergabe und Ausstellung jedes Siegels persönlich anwesend sein. Wird dieser Anforderung nicht entsprochen, gilt das Dokument als ungültig.'"
languages.original_text: "Decree 424, Clause 79, Amendment 8 of the Law on Certifying a Mercatum Tabula Officiale With Sponsorship of a Bearer of the Warrant of Trade: 'The sponsoring Rogue Trader must be present at the placing and certifying of each seal. If this requirement is not met, the document will be deemed invalid.'"

traits.locale_text: "Erlass 424, Absatz 79, Zusatz 8 des Gesetzes zur Zertifizierung eines Mercatum Tabula Officiale bei Unterstützung durch einen Träger des Handelsbriefs: 'Der unterstützende Freihändler muss bei Vergabe und Ausstellung jedes Siegels persönlich anwesend sein. Wird dieser Anforderung nicht entsprochen, gilt das Dokument als ungültig.'"
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Bir Ticari Ruhsatname Hamilinin Kefaletinde Mercatum Tabula Officiale Tasdik Edilmesine İlişkin Kanunun 424 Numaralı Kararnamesinin 79 Sayılı Bendinin 8 Sayılı Ekinde şöyle yazmaktadır: 'Kefil olan Hür Tacir, her mührün basılması ve tasdik edilmesi sırasında hazır bulunmalıdır. Eğer bu şart yerine getirilmezse belge geçersiz sayılacaktır.'"
languages.original_text: "Decree 424, Clause 79, Amendment 8 of the Law on Certifying a Mercatum Tabula Officiale With Sponsorship of a Bearer of the Warrant of Trade: 'The sponsoring Rogue Trader must be present at the placing and certifying of each seal. If this requirement is not met, the document will be deemed invalid.'"

traits.locale_text: "Bir Ticari Ruhsatname Hamili'nin Kefaletinde Mercatum Tabula Officiale Tasdik Edilmesine İlişkin Kanunun 424 Numaralı Kararnamesinin 79 Numaralı Bendinin 8 Numaralı Ekinde şöyle yazmaktadır: 'Kefil olan Hür Tacir, her mührün basılması ve tasdik edilmesi sırasında hazır bulunmalıdır. Eğer bu şart yerine getirilmezse belge geçersiz sayılacaktır.'"
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals
